overview.en: We are BiNGO.Fun which is the first pan entertainment platform with block chain as its core technique and crypto wallet as its center in the world. BiNGO is now serving the developer, publisher and users. It is based on the social features of the block chain such as heavy user agglutinant, frequent communications and game players with communities and so on. Under this condition it applies the decentralized theory to the Implementation View such as large-scale users gathering, game players communications, voting etc. BiNGO itself has own game development ability and its technical team once developed games contributed great in multiple platforms of Tencent. Besides these, they were also global featured by Google Play in which to be known by many users all over the world.
overview.zh: BiNGO.Fun是全球首家利用区块链作为核心技术，数字钱包为中心的泛娱乐平台。BiNGO服务于发行商、研发商及用户，基于区块链人群黏性大沟通频繁，游戏人群集群讨论等社交特点，将去中心化原理应用于大规模用户聚合和游戏玩家沟通、投票等实现场景的全球范围内的新一代泛娱乐平台。BiNGO平台本身具有游戏自主研发实力，其技术团队本身研发产品曾在腾讯多平台大获成功，也被谷歌商店全球推荐，游戏用户遍布全球。
